CustomField.description: A second comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 2 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A second comment entered by the submitter when the request was submitted. The comment label is specified by the "Submission Comment 2 Label" field in the related approval process definition.
CustomField.label: Submission Comment 2
